title: The Golden age of Flemish art
creator_credit: Paul Haesaerts, Jean Van Raemdonck and Art et Cinema
brief_description: The Golden age of Flemish art explores the meanings, beauties and quaint anecdotal material hidden in the incredibly detailed paintings of Flemish “primitives”. The film displays and comments upon works by Jan Van Eyck, Roger van der Weyden, Dirk Bouts, Hans Memling, Hugo van der Goes, Hieronymus Bosch, Pieter Bruegel, and Quentin Metsus.
